Package ohos.agp.components

Class ComponentProvider.Action

  • java.lang.Object
    • ohos.agp.components.ComponentProvider.Action
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Sequenceable
    Enclosing class:
    ComponentProvider

    public abstract static class ComponentProvider.Action
extends Object
implements Sequenceable
    Describes actions that can be performed on remote components.

    Remote components are a component hierarchy that can be displayed and updated in another application.

    Since:
    1

    • Field Detail

      • MERGE_REPLACE

        public static final int MERGE_REPLACE
        Allows merging and replacement.

        When multiple ComponentProvider.Action are applied to the same attribute of the same component, these actions can be merged.

        Since:
        1
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • apply

        public abstract void apply​(ComponentContainer root)
                    throws ComponentProvider.ComponentProviderException
        Applies the action of updating component content.
        Parameters:
        root - Indicates the root node of all components defined by ComponentProvider.
        Throws:
        ComponentProvider.ComponentProviderException - Throws this exception if the system cannot handle an error.
        Since:
        1

      • mergeOperation

        public int mergeOperation​()
        Returns the merge behavior. The default value is MERGE_REPLACE.
        Returns:
        Returns MERGE_REPLACE by default.
        Since:
        1

      • getActionTag

        public abstract int getActionTag​()
        Obtains the action type.

        The returned action type varies depending on ComponentProvider.Action.

        Returns:
        Returns the action type.

      • getActionKey

        public String getActionKey​()
        Obtains the action key.

        Each action has a unique key for identification.
